name: Horde
description:
Complimentary pieces come together to form the Horde. This striking jacket from 987 features a strong asymmetrical design with a high-lo hem and aggressive detailing on the sleeves. 
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
部落风衣是由几块独特的布料缝补拼接而成的.这一款来自987服装的酷炫夹克选择了高低边的不对称设计，并且在袖子处的设计也是极其精致特别. 
女款目前缺货.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-KCTrending
